content: PLT 300 Digital layout tool Automated construction layout tool to speed-up jobsite stake-out using digital methods and BIM ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Digital layout tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features One-person construction layout and measuring – digital layout tools cut the labor needed for construction staking in half, while significantly increasing the number of points possible in one day Get started faster – automatic stationing and tilt compensation for quick setup on the jobsite Digitized construction layout using green laser and tablet – simply tap the stake-out point you need on the controller, and the layout tool will localize it in reality using the motorized green laser pointer BIM-ready digital layout tool – bring the accuracy and efficiency of BIM-to-Field to your jobsites by switching to digital construction layout tools On the Hilti CPC battery platform – power this digital layout tool using the same batteries as all your Hilti 22V power tools (not compatible with Nuron batteries) Applications Staking out 2D and 3D positions on the jobsite using digital CAD/BIM input Laying out formwork, positions for excavation and MEP fastening points on floors and ceilings Laying out single and dual slopes Laying out and transferring building control lines As-built measurement of existing features, including real-time area and volume calculations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Distance measurement accuracy: ±3 mm + 10 ppm Operating distance range – of remote control (diameter): 5 - 328 ft IP protection class: IP 55 (EN 60529) Technical Data | Distance measurement accuracy | ±3 mm + 10 ppm | Operating distance range – of remote control (diameter) | 5 - 328 ft | IP protection class | IP 55 (EN 60529) | Maximum operating time | 5 h | Battery type | Li-Ion B 22/2.6 | Charging time | 0.25 h | Laser class | Class 2 (EN 60825) | Operating temperature range | -4 - 122 °F | Weight | 11.71 lb ### ITEMS- 3701289 - PLT 300 Head Unit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PLT 300 Layout tool - 1x PLT 300 Tool case assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 1x B 22/2.6 Battery pack - 1x POA 128 Backpack - 1x CFB1 Carry belt
